sections.title: Installation
sections.content: Install the clojure package, or clojure-gitAUR for the development version.

sections.title: REPL
sections.content:
To run the REPL, install leiningen from leiningen package. After installation, you will need to create this directory for lein.

```
mkdir -p ~/.lein
```

Then in a terminal type:

```
lein repl
```
